NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Spraying machinery for agriculture or horticulture

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B03

TITLE.P: Tender for the Supply and Delivery of Plant and Equipment 2015

SHORT_DESCR.P: Dublin City Council invite tenders from suppliers for the supply and delivery of Plant and Equipment in 14 separate lots to Dublin City Council, Parks and Landscape Services Division. Requirements include: mowers, tractors, trailers etc. Please see the tender documents for details of the exact requirements and lots. The documents applicable to all lots is available in the “Documents” section under Lot 1.
1 No. 25 h.p. to 30 h.p. approx. front mounted(out
Front) 60” approx. cutting deck, hydrostatic.
Transmission, fitted with lights, flashing beacon to.
Be located in a position not higher than the height.
Of the cab and in a location generally visible,
Complying with current road traffic regulations.
Inclusive of vehicle registration, manufacturers.
Steel safety cab and tool kit. Safety Belts to be.
Provided. See the tender document for full details.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Quality- Degree to which the Tender meets preferred specification
Quality- Model Features
Details of Guarantees, Warranties, After-sales service

TITLE.P: Lot 2. -30 hp (approx) multi- purpose compact tractor

SHORT_DESCR.P: 5 No. Diesel, 3 or 4 cylinder multi- purpose
Compact tractors, 30h.p. approx. with 3 pt.
Linkage, p.t.o. rear discharge cutting deck of 60”.
Mid mounted, instant forward / reverse.
Hydrostatic transmission, manufacturers steel.
Safety cab and tool kit, fitted with lights, flashing.
Beacon to be located in a position not higher than.
The height of the cab and in a location generally.
Visible, capable of a road travel. See tender.
Document for full details.

SHORT_DESCR.P: 1 No. Ride -on Triple Cylinder mower, 21hp
Approx Diesel Engine, 3WD Hydrostatic,
Electronically controlled. Suitable for maintenance.
Of golf fairways, with floating cylinder heads,
Grass box. 2.15m Working Width Approx, 8-11.
Bladed Cylinders, Extra Wide Turf Tyres suitable.
For fine turf areas. Mowing Speed in 3WD of 10.
Km/h approx. capable of operating close to.
Features without damage to edge construction.
e.g. bunkers. See tender document for full
Details.
